Message.Title: what do you do with YHOO?
Message.Msg: 1) I use YHOO for news, finance, real estate.... I spent about at least two hours just on YHOO site. 2) YHOO stockholders needs to know what is in for them and not what Wall Street tells them. The big money from 401K and pension funds, and all the real hard working people put their hard saving money into these pool of fund decided what to do. What is real and not real. The real is money. The fake is Good Well. 3) What if YHOO give itself lots GOOD WELL in their accounting? Multiple Expansion?

Message.Title: what about reverse stock split and stock buy back and cash dividend
Message.Msg: Don't just do one thing. 1) do a reverse stock split to reduce float. 2) do a stock buy back to reduce float. 3) give some money to stockholders to help them buy houses. 4) do or sell or joint venture with AAPL and NOK. All great companies with huge amount of CASH. It is like marry to someone in the same "money" class.

Message.Title: Yahoo Bing Still Beating Google Ad Click Rate In Q3
Message.Msg: ......The partnership between Yahoo (YHOO) and Microsoft's (MSFT) Bing last quarter beat the worldwide average with a 1.61% click-through rate in the U.S., better than the 1.25% rate for Google's (GOOG) ads...... .....Advertisers in Q3 were willing to pay 66 cents for a click-through from Yahoo, better than the worldwide average of 46 cents. Google's click-through rate was 45 cents......... .....Yahoo-Bing's U.S. paid search ad revenue rose 37% in Q3 from the year-earlier quarter, while Google's rose 16%, according to Kenshoo. Overall paid search ad revenue in the U.S. rose 29%........

Topic.Title: Rhinoplasty

I think she will do a good job for YHOO but I would like to hear more about her direction than plans for a Christmas Party, myself. So whaddaya think of YHOO? Blessings :)
